main event: On December 15, 1952, multiple witnesses reported seeing a bright, metallic-appearing unidentified flying object performing rapid, erratic movements over Greensboro, North Carolina.
interesting points: The object was observed by at least two adult male civilian witnesses,It was described as round and approximately 30 feet in diameter,The sighting lasted about 10 to 15 seconds during which the object exhibited a zig-zag motion,No sound was heard from the object during its flight,This incident coincides with another report of a similar object in Hurstville, South Carolina.
